section.title: Creating a New Query Mapping XML File
section.para:
Users can create Query Mapping XML file through Eclipse Menu or Context Menu.
Opening through Eclipse Menu
Select "File > New > SQL XML File"
Opening through Context Menu
Select "New > SQL XML File" on Context Menu at Eclipse Package Explorer, etc.

When creating new Query Mapping XML file, check the following items.
Check Eclipse project and folder name. Query Mapping XML file is created in the defined location.
The extension of Query Mapping XML file must be ".xml".
Check whether unique file name was given. The name of Query Mapping XML file must be unique in the defined project and folder, and which will be validated automatically at file creation.
